Package com.martinandersson.javaee.ejb.transactions Description

EJB 3.2, section "8.4 Application Assembler's Responsibilities": 

     [..] the behavior specified by the transaction attributes is typically an
     intrinsic part of the semantics of an application.
TODO: "Inheritance" of bean managed transactions into beans who use container managed transaction demarcation. Beans that use bean managed transaction demarcation does not inherit CMT and will most likely fail if trying to start a nested transaction.
